title: [Duskruin Arena, Sands Approach]
description: Still visible beneath a thin layer of sand, dark stains mar the stone floor, the coloring that of dried blood creating a grisly pathway through the entrance to the arena itself, just visible ahead.  Bright torchlight illuminates the arena beyond, spilling through into the otherwise dark corridor.

Still visible beneath a thin layer of sand, dark stains mar the stone floor, the coloring that of dried blood creating a grisly pathway through the entrance to the arena itself, just visible ahead.  Bright torchlight illuminates the arena beyond, spilling through into the otherwise dark corridor.  A ramp leads slightly downward to another arena entrance.
